Uses of Class
com.irurueta.server.commons.email.TextEmailMessage

    • Uses of TextEmailMessage in com.irurueta.server.commons.email

      Subclasses of TextEmailMessage in com.irurueta.server.commons.email 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  ApacheMailTextEmailMessage
      Class containing a text only email message to be sent using Apache Mail.
      class  ApacheMailTextEmailMessageWithAttachments
      Class containing a text only email message that can contain file attachments and is meant to be sent using Apache Mail.
      class  AWSTextEmailMessage
      Class containing a text only email message to be sent using Amazon SES.
      class  AWSTextEmailMessageWithAttachments
      Class containing a text only email message that can contain file attachments and is meant to be sent using Amazon SES.
      class  JavaMailTextEmailMessage
      Class containing a text only email message to be sent using JavaMail.
      class  JavaMailTextEmailMessageWithAttachments
      Class containing a text only email message that can contain file attachments and is meant to be sent using JavaMail.
      class  TextEmailMessageWithAttachments<E>
      Base class for text only email messages containing file attachments.
      Methods in com.irurueta.server.commons.email that return TextEmailMessage 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      protected static TextEmailMessage TextEmailMessage.create​(EmailProvider provider)
      Creates a textual email message using given email provider.
      static TextEmailMessage TextEmailMessage.create​(EmailSender sender)
      Creates a textual email message using provided email sender.
      protected static TextEmailMessage TextEmailMessage.create​(java.lang.String subject, EmailProvider provider)
      Creates a textual email message having provided subject and given email provider.
      static TextEmailMessage TextEmailMessage.create​(java.lang.String subject, EmailSender sender)
      Creates a textual email message having provided subject and using provided email sender.
      protected static TextEmailMessage TextEmailMessage.create​(java.lang.String subject, java.lang.String text, EmailProvider provider)
      Creates a textual email message having provided subject, text content and using given email provider.
      static TextEmailMessage TextEmailMessage.create​(java.lang.String subject, java.lang.String text, EmailSender sender)
      Creates a textual email message having provided subject, text content and using provided email sender.
